mapper.select: select iname, count(*) c from dish_ing group by iname order by c desc

select db.RCP_NM, re.iname, db.RCP_SEQ, db.ATT_FILE_NO_MAIN from dishDB db right join (select d.RCP_SEQ, d.iname from dish_ing d right join refrigerator r on d.iname = r.iname where r.mnum = #{mnum} order by r.`expiration date`, r.iname) re on db.RCP_SEQ = re.RCP_SEQ

select db.*,'재료' as str from dishDB db where RCP_NM regexp #{search} union distinct select db.*,'레시피' as str from dishDB db where RCP_SEQ in (select RCP_SEQ from dish_ing where iname regexp #{search})

select * from (select * from dish_ing where iname like concat('%',#{ing1},'%') limit 0,10) ing1 union distinct select * from (select * from dish_ing where iname like concat('%',#{ing2},'%') limit 0,10) ing2 union distinct select * from (select * from dish_ing where iname like concat('%',#{ing3},'%') limit 0,10) ing3 union distinct select * from (select * from dish_ing where iname like concat('%',#{ing4},'%') limit 0,10) ing4 union distinct select * from (select * from dish_ing where iname like concat('%',#{ing5},'%') limit 0,10) ing5
select distinct(iname) from refrigerator where mnum =#{mnum} order by `expiration date`
select db.*, (select iname from dish_ing where iname = #{iname} group by iname) as iname from dishDB db where RCP_SEQ in (select RCP_SEQ from dish_ing ing where iname = #{iname}) limit 0,1
